item.comment: Game that is K2-like-theme and K2-like-mechanics. But the real clue are differences that I enjoy more or less. Good game, that every K2 owner should play :)

Treasure Hunter
item.comment:
[tested on prototype]
Easy to learn, exciting to play. Family game with a very clever draft mechanism. Interesting game that is must-have after show-off.

item.name: Vikings: Warriors of the North
item.comment: Played a prototype few times and... it's very well balanced game! Easy to learn, and easy to boost adrenaline a lil' :)
